revision.comment: it's better to know what the property does first before knowing how to use it
revision.text:
Properties introduced by {{Class|BasicArmorPickup}}.
<onlyinclude>* '''{{LE|Armor.SaveAmount}}''' ''amount'' :The amount of armor that this item gives. * '''{{LE|Armor.SavePercent}}''' ''percentage'' :The percentage of damage that the armor absorbs. :Percentage is specified as a floating point value between 0.0 and 100.0 which is converted internally to a floating point value between 0.0 and 1.0 * '''{{LE|Armor.MaxFullAbsorb}}''' ''amount'' :The amount of damage that this armor will ''fully'' absorb per [[tic]]. * '''{{LE|Armor.MaxAbsorb}}''' ''amount'' :The maximum amount of damage (after adjustment) that this armor will absorb per tic.</onlyinclude> [[Category:Editing references]]
